advanced_settings_allowed_match_count_er: The number you entered has exceeded the limit. Please try a different number.
The number should be equal or greater than 0
advanced_settings_allowed_match_count_su: Related DLP policies will trigger when the match count exceeds the number set.
advanced_settings_subtitle: Define your profile using volume-based detection and more.
configure_cancel_message: You will lose any changes you have made to this profile
configure_confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this profile?
configure_custom_description: Configure detection entries for your customized profile. You can create up to %{max_entries} entries with your account. Note that DLP scans will not start until you create an HTTP policy.
configure_delete_confirmation_descriptio: Continuing will delete this detection entry from your account. To reinstate this detection entry, you will need to configure a new custom entry.
configure_delete_confirmation_title: Are you sure you want to delete %{entry_name}?
configure_description: If you need help, hereâ€™s our <0>documentation</0> about DLP profiles.
configure_entry_custom_description: You have used %{number} / %{max_entries} custom DLP entries. Contact your account team to request a limit increase.
configure_entry_description: Choose which detection entries you want to apply to uploaded or downloaded files through Gateway HTTP policies.
configure_entry_predefined_on_custom_des: Add existing predefined and integration entries or create new custom entries.
configure_mip_description: The detection entries are synced with Microsoft Information Protection(MIP) sensitivity labels and are maintained by Microsoft.
configure_name_readonly_warning: This field is pre-filled and cannot be changed.
configure_table_mip_description: The detection entries are synced with the Microsoft sensitivity label. The labels will refresh every 24 hours.
context_analysis_subtitle: Scan the context of predefined entries to only return matches surrounded by keywords.
dataset_config_upload_file_description: Select a .csv or a .txt file that has one column of data.
dataset_config_upload_file_description_e: Select a .csv or a .txt file that has column headers removed. Upon upload, all data will be hashed and stored.
dataset_config_upload_instructions: Drop your file here or select a file.
dataset_config_upload_limit: Must be a .csv or .txt file type
dataset_create_failure_encrypt: Dataset created, but the upload and encryption failed: %{error}. Check the dataset upload instructions and try uploading again.
dataset_create_subtitle: Upload a file containing data you want to use as a DLP Profile entry. There is an upload limit of %{cellLimit} cells per account.
dataset_list_description: DLP datasets support .csv and .txt as source files. There is an upload limit of %{cellLimit} cells per account. <0>Prepare a data set for upload.</0>
dataset_type_cwl_description: Use CWL for non sensitive data. Cloudflare will store the uploaded data and any matched data will be plaintext in payload logs.
dataset_type_description: Choose how you want Cloudflare to handle this dataset. You cannot change this setting later. <0>Learn more.</0>
dataset_type_edm_description: Use EDM for sensitive data. Cloudflare will only store a hash of the data and any matched hashes will be redacted in payload logs.
dataset_update_subtitle: Upload a file containing data you want to use as an EDM entry. Your dataset will be encrypted. There is an upload limit of %{cellLimit} cells per account.
dataset_upload_modal_description: Replace your current file with a new .csv or a .txt file that has column headers removed. Upon upload, all data will be hashed and stored.
datasets_description: Upload a dataset to bulk create DLP Profile entries.
dcp: Prohibits users from copying and pasting content between a remote web page and their local machine. Cannot be used in conjunction with Disable clipboard redirection.
dcr: Prevents users from copying isolated content from the remote browser to their local clipboard and pasting content from their local clipboard into isolated pages. Cannot be used in conjunction with Disable copy / paste.
dd: Prohibits users from exporting files from the remote browser to their local machine.
dk: Prohibits users from performing keyboard input into the remote web page.
dp: Prohibits users from printing remote web pages to their local machine.
du: Prohibits users from uploading files from their local machine into a remote web page.
edm_dataset_create_subtitle: Upload a file containing data you want to use as an EDM entry. Your dataset will be encrypted. There is an upload limit of %{cellLimit} cells per account.
edm_description: Upload a dataset to create Exact Data Match (EDM) entries. When added to a DLP profile, EDM entries use the encrypted hash of your data to detect specific values.
edm_list_description: Manage and create encrypted datasets to use for EDM entries. EDM supports .csv and .txt as source files. There is an upload limit of %{cellLimit} cells per account. <0>How to prepare an EDM dataset for upload.</0>
entries_will_be_added: %{smart_count} entry will be added to the profile. |||| %{smart_count} entries will be added to the profile.
exclude_content_type_subtitle: Select a content type to exclude from context analysis and return all matches.
profiles_list_description: DLP profiles contain sensitive data detections used to scan uploaded or downloaded files. You can then apply <0>Gateway HTTP policies</0> to allow or disallow transfer of those files.
profiles_table_description: To use Microsoft Information Protection(MIP) sensitivity labels, add your MIP account through CASB integration.
